questions.question: Is complex installation required?
questions.answer: No. If you already have cameras/microphones, we connect Gideone in a couple of minutes. If equipment is missing, we provide a turnkey solution.

questions.question: What if employees are against cameras?
questions.answer: In 9 out of 10 cases, staff perceive Gideone as a helper, not as surveillance. The system doesn’t penalize but teaches: newcomers adapt faster, and experienced employees receive bonuses for high ratings.

questions.question: How quickly will I see results?
questions.answer: The first changes appear within 3–5 days: employees start mentioning promotions more often. Average check growth occurs by the 2nd—3rd week.

questions.question: How does Gideone work with existing trainings?
questions.answer: The system complements training — it reinforces knowledge in practice and identifies areas for improvement.

questions.question: What about confidentiality?
questions.answer: We use encryption, store audio and video temporarily — reports contain only text analytics. Data protection requirements are strictly followed.

questions.question: How can I be sure it really works?
questions.answer: Usually, average check grows by 10–15% in the first month. We also reduce costs on supervision and coaching sessions, and you can see all statistics in dashboards.

questions.question: Can scripts and rules be changed during the process?
questions.answer: Of course. You make changes via the web interface, and the system instantly applies new phrases and standards.
